```{r}
Sys.timezone()
```
change timezone
```{r}
twdt<-ymd_hms("2019-03-27 15:26:00", tz="Asia/Taipei")
lsbdt<-with_tz(twdt,tzone = "Europe/Lisbon")
lsbdt
nydt<-with_tz(twdt,tzone = "America/New_York")
nydt
```

```{r}
typeof(nydt)
as.double(twdt)
as.double(nydt)
```
